name: Adheeba Thahsin

education.degree: Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering - Information Security
education.institution: National Institute of Technology, Calicut, Kerala

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology

work experience.description: Professional training in Artificial Intelligence and Data Engineering
Implement secure communication between drones and drone to ground station
Design and implementation of fault tolerance methods for the 5G core components such as Access and mobility management function (AMF) and Session management function (SMF)

Worked on the Indigenous 5G Testbed Project funded by the Department of Telecommunication. Development of 5G Core components like AMF, SMF, UPF. Call flow implementation of Session Establishment, Session Modification, Session Release, AN Release, and Service Request

Research and automation approach for system administration and installation tasks of NetAct. Installation, integration, performance and fault management adaptation design for NetAct. Automation of work and task time management for JIRA DevOps

Projects.name: A Heterogeneous Information Network Model for Long Non-Coding RNA Function Prediction
Projects.guide: Dr. Gopakumar G, Computer Science and Engineering, NIT Calicut
Projects.description: This project provides a Computational method for predicting function and disease association of long Non-Coding RNA (lncRNA) in the human body which are found to be affecting cancer. The model predicts the functions of lncRNAs by making use of a meta-path based measure, AvgSim on a Heterogeneous Information Network (HIN).

Projects.name: Automated Music System Based on Facial Expression
Projects.guide: Associate Professor Sasinas Alias Haritha Z A, Information Technology, GEC Palakkad
Projects.description: Developed a desktop application to play songs that match the user's current emotional state. A multilayer perceptron (MLP) neural network is trained to predict human emotions based on input data.

Projects.name: Revealing Upcoming Topics in Social Network
Projects.guide: Asst.Prof. Geethu Mary George, Information Technology, GEC Palakkad
Projects.description: An application that detects emerging topics in the social network during a given time frame. Real-time tweets were collected using the Twitter API. Hashtags, follower count, and retweet count were used to identify emerging topics

Projects.name: Immo Eliza Price Prediction
Projects.guide: AI Coach. Vanessa Rivera Qui√±ones, BeCode, Ghent
Projects.description: The Immo Eliza Price Predictor is a web application deployed on Streamlit that allows users to predict property prices in Belgium based on their specific requirements.

Projects.name: Holiday Management System
Projects.guide: Asst.Prof. Naseer Babu, Computer Science and Engineering, NIT Calicut
Projects.description: An online web application for simple and easier management of holidays. It helps the users to make touring more exciting and economical by suggesting travel plans based on user budget and time period.

publications: S. Kumar, A. Thahsin, M. M and G. G, "A Heterogeneous Information Network Model for Long Non-Coding RNA Function Prediction," in IEEE/ACM Transactions on Computational Biology and Bioinformatics, doi: 10.1109/TCBB.2020.3000518.
extracurricular: Active participant in college FOSS cell (2015)
